casebody.data:
Tanya J. MCCLOSKEY, Acting Consumer Advocate
v.
PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION Petition of: Aqua Pennsylvania Wastewater No. 743 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. April 23, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 23rd day of April, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
